snippet: Well-trained health care workers can do some jobs as well or better, and for much less money.
abstract: Editorial highlights initiatives across country that use non-doctors to provide medical care, which address both shortage of doctors and rising costs of health care.
lead_paragraph: Well-trained health care workers can do some jobs as well or better, and for much less money.
